009package imagingbook.common.util.progress;
010
011/**
012 * A simple progress monitor that only prints the progress of the monitored target task
013 * to the console.
014 * See {@link ProgressMonitorExample} for a usage example.
015 * 
016 * 
017 * @see ProgressMonitor
018 * @see ProgressReporter
019 * @see ProgressMonitorExample
020 */
021public class ConsoleProgressMonitor extends ProgressMonitor {
022        
023        /**
024         * Constructor.
025         * @param target the task ({@link ProgressReporter}) to be monitored
026         */
027        public ConsoleProgressMonitor(ProgressReporter target) {
028                super(target);
029        }
030
031        @Override
032        public void handleProgress(double progress, long elapsedNanoTime) {
033                System.out.format("progress = %.3f elapsed time = %.2fs\n", progress, elapsedNanoTime / 1.0e9);
034        }
035        
036        @Override
037        public void close() {
038                super.close();
039                System.out.println("done.");
040        }
041
042}
